first.speaker: Curator
first.content: Seems you earned lots of money.

12.speaker: Curator
12.content: Some visitors might want you to do something speical..

14.speaker: Curator
14.content: Dont worry just adding some numbers

15.speaker: Curator
15.content: Dolphins can do that, I'm sure you can do that too.

16.speaker: Curator
16.content: Just calculate the value they want and hold the coins with the same value to them.

17.speaker: Curator
17.content: You can use [color=red]SPACE + move key[/color] to pick up or drop down coins
